description: These savoury biscuits take no time to make and are delicious alongside homemade soup or served with cheese.
steps: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Line a baking tray with greaseproof paper.
Rub the flour and butter together in a bowl until the mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Stir in the chives and feta. Add the milk and stir together to form a dough.
Tip the dough out onto a floured work surface and roll out to a thickness of 0.5cm/¼ in thickness.
Using a biscuit cutter, cut out shapes and place onto the baking tray. Re-roll any leftover dough to make more biscuits.
Bake in the oven for 8–10 minutes, or until risen and golden-brown.
title: Savoury bites
